name: Bicep Syntax Check

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'bicep/**'
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  validate:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Azure CLI
        uses: azure/setup-azurecli@v1

      - name: Validate Bicep file
        run: az bicep build --file bicep/main.bicep
